sentences.sContent: They seem interested in a peace settlement and have begun putting out feelers.
sentences.sCn: 他们似乎有意达成和平协议，并且已经开始在探风了。

words.tran: 有感觉的；有同情心的；富于感情的
感觉，触觉；感情，情绪；同情
感觉；认为（feel的现在分词）；触摸

trans.tranCn: [动] 触角；试探；试探者；厚薄规
trans.tranOther: one of the two long things on an insect’s head that it uses to feel or touch things. Some sea animals also have feelers.
